level.heading: License to confer degrees - Revocation of license; notice; hearing before Commission; review.
Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 4004(b)(3) of Fiscal Year 2006 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2005 (D.C. Act 16-168, July 26, 2005, 52 DCR 7667).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 1-104
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-104, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 29A-615.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29A-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Reorganization Plan No. 3 of 1988 changed the name of the Commission from the Educational Institution Licensure Commission to the Education Licensure Commission.
